about_the_game:
In this fast-paced, infinite jumping adventure, guide your cat as they leap from platform to platform, racing against the rising water that speeds up the longer you survive. Precision and quick reflexes are key as you collect milk and fish for bonus points, all while navigating randomly generated platforms. With its charming pixel art and simple controls, the game offers a challenging yet rewarding experience where every jump counts. A throwback to simpler times. How high can you climb before the water catches up?

  • Randomly generated platforms keep every run fresh and unpredictable.

  • The water rises faster and faster every few seconds, adding to the challenge.

  • Simple yet responsive controls, perfect for quick sessions or extended play.

  • Collect milk for points and fish for even more bonus points.

  • Supports many controllers with plug-and-play functionality.

  • Charming pixel art style, evoking the nostalgia of classic games.

  • Unlock Steam achievements as you master the game.

name: The Last of the 9 Lives

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Last of the 9 Lives

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics supporting OpenGL 2.1 / DirectX 11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (3GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 2 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Leap through an endless series of platforms as a nimble cat, racing to stay ahead of the ever-rising water. Collect milk and fish for bonus points while mastering precise jumps in this challenging infinite jumper. A throwback to simpler times. How long can you jump for before the water catches up?
